name: Joy Life
description:
Game introduction

The basement of the Hundred Percent Hotel is a gathering place for high society, where celebrities enjoy parties, drinking and having fun.
Tonight, the so-called brightest newcomer - Joy is here, and she can't wait to find someone to dance with.
Ladies and gentlemen, do you want to have a happy dance with tonight's charming female guest—joy? sure! Just solve her puzzles to unlock various dance poses!

Gameplay

In the game, you need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the flopped cards are inconsistent, there will be no change. The way to pass the level is to eliminate all the cards in the picture.
